author: Darren Weaver
title: Gravity has built a jet-powered ‘Iron Man’ suit
text:
8:56 AM ET Mon, 19 Feb 2018 | 01:17 
U.K.-based company Gravity has set a world record for "fastest speed in a body-controlled jet engine power suit." The suit makes you look like a real-life Iron Man. It has two jet engines attached to each arm and one engine mounted on the back. The suit, which produces more than 1,000 horsepower, has sold for $250,000. The company currently doesn't have plans for mass production.
